reviewText:
this whole series is amazing, I'm kind of sad that they stopped production on the dvds but i think there are enough out there to get a complete set.

TV 28 its self has some of the best episodes. in particular "dimensional rift: wheres darling" which was an anime filler that best exemplifies Mamoru Oshii's directing style, and how he uses visuals to convey the bulk of the story.
